title: User Account Creation
description: As a customer, I want to create a user account, so that I can register and start using the application.
attributes_and_rules: Account must include valid email, unique username, and strong password
acceptance_criteria: User can successfully register using valid email and password
test_cases: Given a valid email and password, When the user submits the registration form, Then the account should be created successfully

title: User Login
description: As a registered user, I want to log in to my account, so that I can access personalized features.
attributes_and_rules: Login must verify email and password, and support 'Remember Me' functionality
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using valid credentials
test_cases: Given a registered email and password, When the user submits the login form, Then the user should be logged in successfully

title: Email and Mobile Verification
description: As a user, I want to verify my email and mobile number, so that my account is secured and authenticated.
attributes_and_rules: Verification codes sent via email and SMS, must be entered to complete verification
acceptance_criteria: User can verify email and mobile number using the received verification codes
test_cases: Given a verification code sent to email, When the user submits the code, Then the email should be verified
Given a verification code sent to mobile, When the user submits the code, Then the mobile number should be verified
